oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Experiment at Highlander
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Article about Highlander and mine labor organizing from Direction by Lillian Gilkes. The article explores Myles Horton's vision to provide labor organization for the people of Grundy County, 80% of whom were unemployed after the closure of local mines. The final image in the article is from the film "People of the Cumberland."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gilkes, Lillian Barnard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Labor; Labor unions; Miners--Labor unions; League of American Writers; Writers' workshops; Student newspapers and periodicals; Children; United States. Works Progress Administration; Cooperative schools; Communities; Community development
